title: serinzo
author: serinzo
content: Hello Evryeone ,,i noticed in Duino-Coin Miner that i can set how many mining threads to start mining with as below image https://gcdnb.pbrd.co/images/QN6wEqYhx70a.png?o=1Dose anyone know how we can do that with xmrig miner Below is the final line i uasually use with xmrig so what changes i need to make to set specific threads Quote ./xmrig -o stratum+tcp://randomxmonero.auto.nicehash.com:9200 -u WALLET ADRESS -p x -k -a rx/0Thanks in advance

comments.author: waywoos2
comments.body: Try -t and then the number of threads
